page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content: IN THE{BRUNTON}AREA{FOURTEEN}PEOPLE HAVE{CARS}WHICH THEY USE FOR{WORK}AND {PLEASURE.}ONLY A VERY FEW PEOPLE USE THE{BUS}FOR{WORK.}ABOUT{THREE}PEOPLE USE{VANS}AND{SCOOTERS}FOR{WORK}AND {PLEASURE,}AND MORE THAN{TEN PEOPLE USE{BICYCLES}FOR{PLEASURE.}THE PEOPLE NEED{TRANSPORT}FOR GOING TO {WORK}BECAUSE VERY FEW PEOPLE WORK IN AND AROUND THE{BRUNTON}AREA.THERE ARE {TWO BUS SERVICES}IN THIS AREA;{ONE}IS A{REGIONAL COUNCIL YELLOW MINI BUS WHICH IS RARELY USED WHICH COMES ON {TUESDAY}FROM{BLEBO CRAIGS}TO{CUPAR}VIA BRUNTON. ON{THURSDAYS}THE MINIBUS GOES FROM{BRUNTON}TO{WORMIT.}THE OTHER IS A RED SERVICE BUS RUN BY A LOCAL COMPANY WHICH GOES TO{CUPAR,DUNDEE}AND {NEWBURGH.
